Set.サボる・サボる: to cut (skip) classes; to loaf on the job; to idle away one's time

Set.様・さま: state; way (a person does something); Mr. or Mrs.

Set.兼業・けんぎょう: holding two jobs at the same time

Set.共働き・ともばたらき: dual income (husband and wife both working)

Set.取り次ぐ・とりつぐ: to act as an agent for

Set.嘗める・なめる: to lick; to experience; to make fun of

Set.成り立つ・なりたつ: to consist of; to be practical (logical

Set.入賞・にゅうしょう: winning a prize or place (in a contest

Set.拝啓・はいけい: -- a formal greeting used at the beginning of a letter --

Set.敗北・はいぼく: defeat (as a verb it means 'to be defeated')

Set.潤う・うるおう: to be moist; to profit by

Set.収まる・おさまる: to settle into; to be obtained

Set.納まる・おさまる: to settle into; to be obtained

Set.かぶれる・かぶれる: to react to; to be influenced by

Set.くぐる・くぐる: to pass through; to go around

Set.敬具・けいぐ: Sincerely (used at the end of letter)

Set.転勤・てんきん: transfer (to another office of a company)

Set.甘える・あまえる: to behave like a spoiled child

Set.改まる・あらたまる: to be renewed; to be formal

Set.生かす・いかす: to keep something alive; to make use of

Set.済ます・すます: to finish; to settle; to do without

Set.捜索・そうさく: search (esp. for someone or something missing

Set.建前・たてまえ: position; stance one takes in public; principle

Set.束ねる・たばねる: to tie up in a bundle

Set.付け加える・つけくわえる: to add one thing to another

Set.へりくだる・へりくだる: to deprecate oneself and praise the listener

Set.母国・ぼこく: one's home country (same as 自分の国 (じぶんのくに))

Set.綻びる・ほころびる: to come apart at the seams

Set.見計らう・みはからう: to choose at one's own discretion

Set.民宿・みんしゅく: private house providing lodging and meals to tourists

Set.避ける・よける: to avoid (physical contact with; to ward off

Set.初耳・はつみみ: something heard for the first time

Set.控える・ひかえる: to hold back; to make notes

Set.引取る・ひきとる: to take back; to adopt; to leave

examples.現像・げんぞう:
{kakujo wa jitsuzai shitara yūjin to hanaseta}.


Developing film was shared with friends.
examples.原則・げんそく:
原則にしたがって行動する必要がある。

English translation:
It is necessary to act in accordance with the principle.
